Title: Warforged Seals
Description: Greetings, $n. I am privileged to offer you an excellent opportunity. Through the centuries, we've honed a method by which the very laws of chance themselves can be bent. With a Warforged Seal, valuable artifacts will find their way into your hands more frequently as you pursue Garrosh.
ObjectivesText: Collect 50 Lesser Charms of Good Fortune.

Objectives.Text: Collect: Lesser Charm of Good Fortune
